name: Patrick Bateman (Christian Bale) 『LoRa』
description:
This sigma LORA model was created using 15 images, overall 1500 steps at 1 Epoch. Here are some examples using the base 1.5 model.

I will experiment more with this LORA improve it and then make a new version soon.

Refer closely to the prompts given in the images to get similar results...

As a wise man once said:

"I live in the American Gardens Building on W. 81st Street on the 11th floor. My name is Patrick Bateman. I'm 27 years old. I believe in taking care of myself and a balanced diet and rigorous exercise routine. In the morning if my face is a little puffy I'll put on an ice pack while doing stomach crunches. I can do 1000 now. After I remove the ice pack I use a deep pore cleanser lotion. In the shower I use a water activated gel cleanser, then a honey almond body scrub, and on the face an exfoliating gel scrub. Then I apply an herb-mint facial mask which I leave on for 10 minutes while I prepare the rest of my routine. I always use an after shave lotion with little or no alcohol, because alcohol dries your face out and makes you look older. Then moisturizer, then an anti-aging eye balm followed by a final moisturizing protective lotion."

For any private work, please feel free to contact me for more information:

odawgthat@gmail.com

Follow for more...

modelVersions.name: Patrick Bateman v1
trainedWords: wearing a black suit with a red tie
modelVersions.description: This is the first experimental version, made using base 1.5 ema only.

meta.prompt:
<lora:Patrick Bateman 100:1>, A stunning full body intricate full colour portrait of (man:1),
wearing a black suit and a red tie, leaning against the wall, smiling, looking at someone
epic character composition,
by ilya kuvshinov, alessio albi, nina masic,
sharp focus, natural lighting, subsurface scattering, f2, 35mm, film grain
meta.negativePrompt: cartoon, 3d, ((disfigured)), ((bad art)), ((deformed)), ((poorly drawn)), ((extra limbs)), ((close up)), ((b&w)), weird colors, blurry
